text: so the har business school has always
had the intellectual ambition to speak
to the most important problems in
business and society and I can't think
of a problem that affects everybody in
the world not just in the United States
more than this question of us
competitiveness I think everybody
understands that we're moving from an
American Century in business to a global
Century in business but the question
that people ask is what will America's
role be in this new Global Century this
is a question that cuts across many
different domains of our business school
you can ask the question how will the
American Financial system respond will
America be a great nation in
entrepreneurship will America have a
great manufacturing base what will the
human capital in America look like so
these are questions that cut across our
finance unit Our Big E
unit our organization Behavior unit all
parts of the school one of the
remarkable things that we have at our
business school is that we have an
intellectual platform that is unmatched
by any other business school we have a
very diverse faculty so we have been
able to draw together under the
leadership of Jan riffkin and Mike
Porter all of the resources that we have
Across The Faculty to speak to this
issue we have an amazing alumni all over
the world we have tried to solicit their
opinion by getting them to respond to a
survey we have this convening power that
allows us to bring to our campus some of
the most extraordinary Business Leaders
and we're going to do that in November
we have through our Publishing Company
our business review that is read by
hundreds of thousands of people all over
the world a vehicle by which we can get
these ideas broadly disseminated part of
what we're trying to do through this
project is to amass all of these aspects
of the school's resources to make sure
that we create a real conversation
around the world on this very important
and Urgent topic there is no more
important time than now for us to more
deeply understand this question and
develop answers that will allow America
to sustain its competitiveness in the
time to
come
